data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for OUTCOME OF BOARD MEETING HELD ON 11.02.2023
data.news_body:
The Board at its meeting held today on Saturday, 11th February, 2023, has taken on record:

- the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and nine months ended on 31st December, 2022 along with the Limited Review Report of the Auditors thereon; and

- the purchase of land parcel admeasuring 1.30 Lakhs square meters situated at Tal. Anand, Dist. Anand, Gujarat which is proposed to be utilized for setting up of a manufacturing facility of Glass Lined and other equipment, the plans for which are under consideration.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform you that the audio recording of the Company''s Q4 & FY22 Earnings Call held on May 25, 2022 regarding discussion on operational and financial performance for the Quarter and Financial Year ended March 31, 2022 (Q4 and FY 2021-22) is available on the Company's website at: https://hleglascoat.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/LII0420220525141501.mp3.Kindly take the above on records.
